data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of Lakhimpur, Assam, India. Please, stir the 11,463 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lakhimpur, Assam, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Lakhimpur, Assam, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Lakhimpur, Assam, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, move the 11,463 believers in the county of Lakhimpur to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Kaibartta people. Make the Kaibartta people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, let those from the 11,463 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Lakhimpur, Assam, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,017,993, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

location.name: Lakhimpur
location.people_groups_list: Mahara, Assamese (Sikh traditions), Assamese (Muslim traditions), Boria Assam, Aiton
